name: Red Car City Tran Sim
description:
Red Car City Tran Sim is the best car driving simulator of 2018. we really appreciate and say thanks to extreme car driving simulator 2018 for its real city streets and to its cars,vehicles and their engines like sports cars which make this extreme car simulator driving. lets have fun and become a best car driver while playing this lamborghini best racing simulator. you are a fast car driver and roads and city streets are open for you.
FEATURES**********
1- 5 sports cars best racing cars
2- Multi modes to play
3- Realistic physics of cars in this best car simulator
4- earn cash and Point scoring to beat your companions
5- Real enviorenment
